text: Titia kunba Yehudi khan etu jaga phale beraikena jadu-tona, jhara-jhari kori thakise. Taikhan bhi jun manu logot dushto atma thakise utu khan ke Probhu Jisu laga naam lobole kosis kori kene eneka koise, “Moi tumike Paul pora prochar kori thaka Jisu laga naam pora bahar te ulai jabole hukum di ase.”
